spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches versus plan: the separate Wash Area + Toilet shown in 2D is rendered as a single combined bathroom (E1/E2). The Entrance-to-the-House vestibule at the top-right of the plan is not represented; instead a single exterior door appears on the right side of the living room (E1/E2/E3). Internal circulation/hall geometry is simplified and does not match the plan’s central passage alignment (E2). Room proportions are noticeably altered: living room and stair zone proportions/footprints differ from the plan, with the stair opening/landing reading larger and shifted relative to the plan (E4). Window placements in multiple rooms do not match the plan positions/counts (E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are generally consistent thickness, but core program fidelity is broken: missing Entrance vestibule/foyer (E1) and missing separate Wash Area room (E1). Adjacency is partially preserved (dining-kitchen-bedroom-living roughly in correct quadrants), but the bathroom suite adjacency/partitioning is incorrect (E2). Exterior entry location/orientation does not match the plan (E2/E3). No clear additional (extra) rooms beyond the plan, but the combined bathroom effectively hallucinates a different room configuration (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Dining, living, bedroom, and kitchen furniture are broadly plausible and placed in the expected rooms, but the plan’s Wash Area fixtures are absent due to the missing room (E1). Some furniture proportions/spacing appear stylized (e.g., living seating arrangement vs available plan footprint), contributing to minor scale inconsistency (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera is coherent and readable. Geometry is mostly clean with consistent materials; lighting is adequate but flat. However, door/window modeling is inconsistent with the plan (functional clarity issue), and some openings read minimally detailed. Overall composition is clear, but the stair/rail and entry are visually emphasized despite being plan-inaccurate.

detected_errors.description: Missing Entrance-to-the-House vestibule/foyer area shown at top-right of the 2D plan.
Exterior entry door is placed on the right wall of the living room in the 3D render instead of the plan’s top-right entrance location.
Entry door configuration/orientation differs: plan indicates a double-door entry from the vestibule; render shows a single hinged door on a different facade.
Missing separate Wash Area room; 2D plan shows Wash Area distinct from Toilet.
Bathroom configuration is hallucinated/altered: Toilet + sink are combined into one room rather than two separate spaces (Wash Area + Toilet).
Interior partitioning/corridor layout differs from the plan (central hall alignment and wall segments do not match).
Proportion distortion in the stair zone and adjacent living circulation area; footprint/landing size and placement do not preserve the plan’s proportions.
Window placement/count mismatches: several windows in the render do not align with the plan’s window locations (notably kitchen/living/bedroom facades).
Some interior door placements/opening positions do not match the plan (bathroom suite and main circulation openings simplified/shifted).
